document_data.name: Mreskan Haundle
document_data.mainbody: '''Mreskan Haundle''' was the seneschal of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Description: Mreskan was an old but kind man.
document_data.Activities: When King [[Ornan Roaryl]] was traveling across the kingdom, Mreskan was left in charge of the rule of Eskorn. He used the [[Seeing Stones]] to communicate with the king whenever was needed.
